A

ABSURD - Static variable in class obr.DTGParser
Absurd predicate used to convert body --> !head to body;head-->ABSURD.
addAtom(Predicate) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Adds an atom into the atom conjunction.
The internal representation of an atom is a graph vertex with predicate value, that is why only a predicate is needed.
addAtom(Vertex<Object>, AtomConjunction) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Add an atom from another atom conjunction.
If the first parameter is not really an atom vertex, this method will silently fail.
addDecidableClassCheck(DecidableClassCheck) - Method in class obr.GRDAnalyser
 
addDecidableClassCheck(DecidableClassCheck) - Method in class obr.GRDAnalyser.DecidableClassChecker
Adds a new decidable class check function into the list.
addEdge(int, int, Integer) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Adds an edge between an atom and a term.
If the arity of the atom id is n, then the position must be in [0;n-1].
addEdge(Predicate, int, Predicate, int) - Method in class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Convenient method to add a non special edge between two predicate positions.
addEdge(Predicate, int, Predicate, int, Boolean) - Method in class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Convenient method to add a non special edge between two predicate positions.
addPredicate(Predicate) - Method in class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Adds a predicate into the graph if not already in.
addTerm(Term) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Adds a term into the atom conjunction.
Note that the term will not be connected to any atom.
addTerm(String) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Adds a term into the atom conjunction from its label.
addVertex(AtomicRule) - Method in class obr.GraphRuleDependencies
Whenever a vertex is added, the rule is checked for unification against all others.
AGRD_LABEL - Static variable in class obr.GRDAnalyser
 
Atom - Class in obr
Represents an atom.
Note that instances of this class can be returned by the atom conjunction class, but this will imply the atom creation.
Atom(Predicate) - Constructor for class obr.Atom
Constructor.
Atom.Iterator - Class in obr
Nested class used to iterate over the terms.
Note that the remove() operation is not supported, and will always throw an UnsupportedOperationException.
Atom.Iterator() - Constructor for class obr.Atom.Iterator
 
ATOM_SEPARATOR - Static variable in class obr.AtomConjunction
Represents the separator between atoms when the conjunction is under a String format.
AtomConjunction - Class in obr
Represents a conjunction of atoms.
AtomConjunction() - Constructor for class obr.AtomConjunction
Default constructor.
The atom conjunction will be empty.
AtomConjunction(String) - Constructor for class obr.AtomConjunction
Constructor from a string representation of an atom conjunction.
AtomConjunction(AtomConjunction) - Constructor for class obr.AtomConjunction
Copy constructor.
AtomConjunction.AtomIterator - Class in obr
Iterator over the atoms of the conjunction.
Since atoms are not stored into the internal structure, the remove operation is not supported.
AtomConjunction.AtomIterator() - Constructor for class obr.AtomConjunction.AtomIterator
 
AtomConjunction.NeighbourIterator - Class in obr
Iterator over the vertices connected to a specific one.

AtomicHypothesisCheck - Class in obr
Checks if all rules in the GRD or in one of its strongly connected components satisfy the atomic-hypothesis property.
AtomicHypothesisCheck() - Constructor for class obr.AtomicHypothesisCheck
 
AtomicRule - Class in obr
Represents an atomic rule.
A rule is an atom conjunction which adds the notions of "body" and "head".
An atomic rule contains only one atom in its head.
AtomicRule() - Constructor for class obr.AtomicRule
Default constructor.
AtomicRule(String) - Constructor for class obr.AtomicRule
Constructor from a string representation.

fromString(String) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Fullfills the atom conjunction from its string representation.
The string must be under the following format (otherwise an exception will be thrown) : <atom 0>ATOM_SEPARATOR<atom 1>ATOM_SEPARATOR...ATOM_SEPARATOR<atom n> Where atoms must be under the following format : <predicate label>BEGIN_TERM_LIST<term 0>TERM_SEPARATOR<term 1>TERM_SEPARATOR...TERM_SEPARATOR <term m>END_TERM_LIST
The predicate labels and arity are used to check their equality, and only labels for terms equality.
fromString(String) - Method in class obr.AtomicRule
Fullfills the rule from its string representation.
fromString(String) - Method in class obr.Predicate
Converts from a string.
A well-formated string is under the form of : <predicate label>/<arity>.
frontier() - Method in class obr.AtomicRule
Creates a new array list containing all vertices which belong to the frontier of the rule.

GraphPositionDependencies - Class in obr
Represents the graph of position dependencies corresponding to a GRD or to one of its strongly connected components.
The graph maintains a hash map to find quickly the vertex corresponding to a predicate and its position.
GraphPositionDependencies() - Constructor for class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Default constructor.
GraphPositionDependencies(Iterable<Vertex<AtomicRule>>) - Constructor for class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Constructor from a set of rules.
GraphRuleDependencies - Class in obr
Unsecure : if a vertex already in the graph is added once again, it may produce strange behaviour if an edge is added manually it may produce errors
GraphRuleDependencies() - Constructor for class obr.GraphRuleDependencies
 
GraphRuleDependencies(String) - Constructor for class obr.GraphRuleDependencies
 
GraphRuleDependencies(GraphRuleDependencies) - Constructor for class obr.GraphRuleDependencies
 
GRDAnalyser - Class in obr
Analyse a graph of rule dependencies to determine if it belongs to decidable class.
Furthermore, the GRDAnalyser will check the strongly connected components of the GRD.

toString() - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Converts the atom conjunction into a String format.
Note that this is just a convenient method for toString(getNbAtoms()).
toString(int) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Converts a subset of the atom conjunction into a String format.
Only atoms whose id is between 0 and the parameter will be converted.

Converts the rule into a String.

toString() - Method in class obr.GraphPositionDependencies
Converts the full graph into a string.
It will first contain the vertices values, and then the edges.

vertexTermIterator() - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Access to the iterator over the vertex terms.
vertexTermIteratorFromAtom(int) - Method in class obr.AtomConjunction
Access to an iterator over the vertex terms which are connected to the specified atom.
If the atom conjunction is well built, the terms will be iterated in their positions ordering.
